items.match: jump backwards to the start of a word  İmleç hareketleri B

items.match: insert before the cursor Ekleme modu - yazma/ekleme modu i

items.match: insert  after the cursor Ekleme modu - yazma/ekleme modu a

items.subtitle: Ekleme modu - yazma/ekleme modu ⎯  O

items.match: append  a new line above the current line Ekleme modu - yazma/ekleme modu O

items.match: begin new line during insert mode Ekleme modu - yazma/ekleme modu Ctrl+j

arg: ekleme modunda sağa doğru yeni bir girinti ekler
items.match: indent  line one shiftwidth during insert mode Ekleme modu - yazma/ekleme modu Ctrl+t

items.title: Ekleme modunda bir girinti siler
items.subtitle: Ekleme modu - yazma/ekleme modu ⎯  Ctrl+d

items.title: Replace <pattern> by 'new <pattern>'
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  :s/<pattern>/new &/
items.match: Replace <pattern> by 'new <pattern>' Regex :s/<pattern>/new &/

items.title: Replace <pattern> by content of register
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  :s/<pattern>/\=@a/
items.match: Replace <pattern> by content of register Regex :s/<pattern>/\=@a/

items.title: Count number of occurrence of <pattern>
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  :s/<pattern>//gn
items.match: Count number of occurrence of <pattern> Regex :s/<pattern>//gn

items.title: Match start
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  \zs
items.match: Match start Regex \zs

items.title: Match end
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  \ze
items.match: Match end Regex \ze

items.title: Positive look behind to find <pattern>
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  <atom>\@<=<pattern>
items.match: Positive look behind to find <pattern> Regex <atom>\@<=<pattern>

items.title: Positive look ahead to find <pattern>
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  <pattern><atom>\@=
items.match: Positive look ahead to find <pattern> Regex <pattern><atom>\@=

items.title: Negative look behind to find <pattern>
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  <atom>\@<!<pattern>
items.match: Negative look behind to find <pattern> Regex <atom>\@<!<pattern>

items.title: Negative look ahead to find <pattern>
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  <pattern><atom>\@!
items.match: Negative look ahead to find <pattern> Regex <pattern><atom>\@!

items.title: Non-greedy 0 or more quantifier
items.subtitle: Regex ⎯  \{-}
items.match: Non-greedy 0 or more quantifier Regex \{-}
